title: AIGP Mock Paper 4

items.stem: Under the EU AI Act, which systems are classified as high-risk?
options: Systems used in critical infrastructure, employment, and essential services
items.explanation: The EU AI Act classifies systems as high-risk based on their use in critical areas like infrastructure, employment, healthcare, and essential services.
